title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning and Social Mirroring via MOOC-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of online learning environments and basic social science concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80% or higher implementation rate of learning plans by applying self-regulated learning strategies in a MOOC environment.
Learners analyze peer progress using social mirroring tools and revise their learning strategies at least three times based on these insights.
Learners diagnose learning outcomes based on formative assessment data, compare results with peer feedback, and propose at least two improvement strategies.
Learners measure social network learning effects through PBL projects and generate activity records with over 90% participation in collaborative tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
